title: Great product
text: I was very happy with this product. It worked well and met my expectations.

title: Average product
text: This product was okay. It did the job, but there were some issues.

title: Disappointing product
text: I was very disappointed with this product. It didn't work as advertised and was a waste of money.

title: Good product
text: Overall, this product was good. It had a few minor issues, but overall I was satisfied with it.

title: Poor product
text: This product was not good. It didn't work as expected and was a disappointment.
